description:
Highway Traffic Racer is a new word in the endless arcade racing genre. Drive on the highway, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones.
KEY FEATURES:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth realistic controls
- 10+ different sports cars to choose from
- 4 detailed terrain views
- 3 game modes
- car customization
-car upgrades
Take a fresh look at the endless racing!
name: Highway Traffic Racer - Car Racing Simulator
